results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-5764785bcb-q6ffq

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: Get "http://10.244.2.2:80/wp-admin/install.php": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the request to the specified URL timed out.

Solution: 
1. Check network connectivity to the pod.
2. Increase the timeout setting for the readiness probe.
3. Ensure the application is running and accessible at the specified URL.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-5764785bcb-q6ffq], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service is missing ready endpoints because the pod isn't ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs <pod-name>`. 3. Verify pod readiness probe configuration. 4. Ensure the application is running correctly. 5. Restart pod if necessary.
